attributes.action: Stop restaurants and cafés from labelling calories on menus.
attributes.additional_details: You need to think about everyone and how this will affect the economy. People are less likely to want to go to restaurants and cafés because they’ll feel so insecure and overwhelmed.
attributes.background: I want you to stop this from happening because you need to take everyone into consideration. You need to think about how this will affect people with eating disorders, body disorders and those who are insecure.
